1.title: Hoverboard Challenge pt. 1
1.plot: Hack Labs is back with another season. This time, things are getting heavy. The student crew is taking a note from Back to the Future and attempting to bring the hoverboard to life.

2.title: Hoverboard Challenge pt. 2
2.plot: While the team is just gearing up, so is the largest hurricane Florida has seen in over a decade. Will they be able to achieve their next checkpoint?

3.title: Hoverboard Challenge pt. 3
3.plot: The Full Sail student crew is starting to hit a rough patch. Will their special guest bring them back from the brink of failure?

4.title: Hoverboard Challenge pt. 4
4.plot: The Hacksmith has stopped by and is here to save the day. With a newfound enthusiasm, the Full Sail student crew is ready to push through.

5.title: Hoverboard Challenge pt. 5
5.plot: With the help of the Hacksmith, it's finally time to test out the hoverboard. Will it work the first time around or will it be forced into another round of remodeling?

6.title: Hoverboard Challenge Finale
6.plot: The exciting conclusion to the 6 part season 2 of Hacker Labs. Will they finally get a working prototype hoverboard?

1.title: Iron Man Helmet Challenge Pt. 1
1.plot: A team of Full Sail students band together to create a prototype Iron Man Helmet. With the use of the Microsoft HoloLens, they're attempting to achieve an interactive UI and a functional faceplate.

2.title: Iron Man Helmet Challenge pt. 2 ft. the Hacksmith
2.plot: The gang is back at it again. This time, they get a little help from YouTube star the Hacksmith. Just how far will they get?

3.title: Iron Man Helmet Challenge pt. 3 ft. the Hacksmith
3.plot: With problems in the user interface, Shae, James and the team are revved up and ready to get this helmet where it needs to be. The HoloLens presents some unforeseen issues, can they get past it in time?

4.title: Iron Man Helmet Challenge pt. 4 ft. the Hacksmith
4.plot: In just under two weeks, Shae, the Hacksmith, and the Full Sail student team were able to pull together faceplate interaction, responsive J.A.R.V.I.S. user interface, and the ability to order pizza.

5.title: Iron Man Helmet Challenge Behind the Scenes
5.plot: We get a behind the scenes look as members of the original Hacker Labs team answer questions from YouTube viewers.

imdb.plot outline: A team of students at Full Sail University come together to create the first-ever, real world, functioning Iron Helmet. Their prototype responds to the name JARVIS and has a select list of commands it's able to perform. With the help of YouTube influencer James Hobson, aka the Hacksmith, the students were able to successfully integrate the Microsoft HoloLens into a 3D printed helmet. Within the confines of the Hololens, JARVIS is able to close the faceplate, scan the environment, analyze faces in the room, and even order pizza for the crew.
imdb.title: Hacker Labs
plot: A team of students at Full Sail University join forces with the Hacksmith to create a real world functioning prototype Iron Man helmet complete with JARVIS operated UI by integrating a Microsoft HoloLens into their design.::REBL HQ

A team of students at Full Sail University come together to create the first-ever, real world, functioning Iron Helmet. Their prototype responds to the name JARVIS and has a select list of commands it's able to perform. With the help of YouTube influencer James Hobson, aka the Hacksmith, the students were able to successfully integrate the Microsoft HoloLens into a 3D printed helmet. Within the confines of the Hololens, JARVIS is able to close the faceplate, scan the environment, analyze faces in the room, and even order pizza for the crew.::REBL HQ
